newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Manila's PHIBOR rates fall across all maturities.
newsitem.headline: Manila's PHIBOR rates fall across all maturities.

text.p: The Philippine interbank offered rates (PHIBOR) fell across the board as the system remained liquid due to the suspension of the weekly Treasury bills auction this week, traders said.
They said about 5.0 billion pesos in fresh funds are expected to be injected from maturing T-bills.
Short-term PHIBOR posted the biggest slide after the Central Bank cut its overnight borrowing rate on Tuesday to 10.75 percent from 11.0 percent, which depressed the interbank call loan rate.
PHIBOR are average swap quotes of 20 banks in the country.
Average rates quoted by 20 banks were:
